body:
Hi Mehdi,

I remember this problem happening to me a while a go but I did not have time to look into it or post on it.  I also had some complicated site geometry and the grid size was also small.  Now that I have seen this happen in two cases, it definitely smells like a bug to me.

Could you post the GH file with the exact grid size and specifications that are causing this to fail?

As Mostapha wrote the radiation components, I feel that we should let him take a look at it first and, if he ends up being too busy after the next few days, I will look into fixing it.

-Chris
